name: Empire: Baaaaastion of Glory
description:
Lead your flock to glory by making them build a monument in your honor.

Give them orders to harvest, build, and defend your land to accumulate enough influence to build your monument.

When you finally get your monument (took them long enough), a new era will dawn. Progress! But at what cost?

A game made by NUS students.

Credits:

Art: Amanda Swee

Design: Johan Ng

Production: Candice Yap

Programming: Muhammad Hanif
